record.dc:title: 214UN6 Hill Farm Site 1UN6, Union County, Tennessee. Dirt and stone mound number 1.
record.wpa:narrative: About 26 feet in diameter. In a test pit 10' by 11' sunk to the disturbed depth of 5 feet. The humus line was 36" below original mound surface. Mound had been looted several times according to local inhabitants.
record.wpa:photograph_category: Mound; People Lab and Field Scenes
